redirects.comments:
This rule redirects Grokipedia articles to the corresponding Wikipedia articles.

**Grokipedia** is an encyclopedia whose content is entirely created by AI trained under the direction of Elon Musk, the founder of Grokipedia.

**Wikipedia** is a non-profit encyclopedia built and maintained by volunteers around the world.

> [!WARNING]
> 
> This rule is still in beta, as it may be updated soon due to the current development status of Grokipedia.
